data.title: SITUATION
questions: In this phase, everyone shares their grasp of our reality.
What has happened?  What got us here?
What’s working/going well? What's not working?
What are our key strengths and critical weaknesses?
Relative to our competition, how strong/weak are we?
What events/issues/trends are impacting us most?
What external threats and opportunities do we face?
Overall, how positive/negative is the environment?
What mission-critical skills/resources do we lack?
How tenable is our present position? How so?

data.title: WANTED FUTURE
questions: In this phase, everyone shares where we’re going.
What metaphor/analogy fits our situation?
What’s our purpose in pursuing this course?
What risks/unknowns could impact our success?
In what direction lies our best potential for success?
What future do we want? What’s our place in that future?
How are we envisioning success? How do we describe it?
What are all the ways forward? How could we get ‘there’?
If successful, how significant will this be for us?
What would tell us this was all worth it?

data.title: PEOPLE + CULTURE
questions: In this phase, everyone shares who and what matters on this journey.
Who are our stakeholders? What do they need/value?
To what extent do they trust us? Support/agree with us?
How will we involve/influence them to get commitment?
What do we truly value? How do we want to be known?
How will we protect these shared values going forward?
What norms/ways of working will be critical to success?
How will we lead by example? Hold ourselves accountable?
How/when will we know the culture has really changed?
How will we recognize and reward the desired behaviors?
Who and what else matters to us on this journey?

data.title: EXECUTION
questions: In this phase, everyone shares what must be done to drive performance.
Working back from the desired outcome, what's our plan?
What will be key to success in achieving our vision?
Who do we set goals/measures for those KSFs/KPIs?
What priority and principles should we apply to this?
How do we break this down into specific deliverables?
Who will own and make those results happen?
What book would you recommend everyone read?
What is each person's role, responsibilities and goals?
What’s the timeline & milestones for achieving the plan?
What’s each person’s commitment to achieving this?
